ground_truth: We see that the graph reaches a maximum at $x = 0.$  The graph of $y = \sin x$ first reaches a maximum at $x = \frac{\pi}{2}$ for positive values of $x,$ so $c = \boxed{\frac{\pi}{2}}.$
